name: Zieltraffic

description: Your experts in the digital sale of serv
overview:
Establishment - Objectives and purpose of the company as we see it

Zieltraffic was founded in 2004 by Bernd Stieber, Werner Kubitscheck and Wolfgang Vogt with the idea of “making the felt performance of online marketing means measurable.” Since then we provide daily proof that the online acquisition of customers and prospective clients can deliver comprehensible results with the right solution, the right strategy and with high performing online marketing instruments. With our year long expertise and product portfolio of Z SALES, Z MEDIA and Z CONSULT, we are guaranteed to have the right product and solution for you. 100% performance without risk, full transparency, cost control and conceptual consulting all in one.

Competence

With our year long practical expertise we provide you with support not only in your online marketing campaigns, but in all questions to do with concept, creation, technology, tracking, campaign set up, and the optimisation of landing pages, processes and conversions. We offer you marketing instruments from all online marketing disciplines with our one stop service. We put together individually tailored solutions to meet your needs and this is vital if we are both to be successful. Our process know-how in combination with our sales model ensures maximum performance; you only pay for success (new customer, prospective customer)

provider.name: Corporate Finance Partners CFP & Founders Investments
